title: 50 + Appetizer Recipes
description: Looking for some great appetizers for your next gathering? In this post, we’re sharing our top appetizer recipes including deviled eggs, crab cakes, sausage balls, bruschetta and caprese skewers. We have dips, salads, toasts and more!
author: Elsie Larson
excerpt: Find the perfect appetizer for your next gathering. Recipes for dips, classics like deviled eggs and easy bites like caprese skewers.
text: Looking for some great appetizers for your next gathering? In this post, we’re sharing our top appetizer recipes including deviled eggs, crab cakes, sausage balls, bruschetta and caprese skewers. We have dips, salads, toasts and more! Crab Cakes Learn to make Maryland Crab Cakes using real lump crab and very little filler. These crab cakes are easy to make at home.  Sausage Balls Cheesy, crispy sausage balls made with just four ingredients. Caprese Skewers Learn to make Caprese Skewers in just minutes using cherry tomatoes, mozzarella balls, fresh basil leaves and balsamic glaze. Pinwheel Sandwiches Finger food perfect for any party or school lunch. Best Baked Macaroni and Cheese Classic baked macaroni and cheese with no eggs or evaporated milk. Avocado Salsa This easy avocado salsa is a cross between guacamole and a salsa verde and makes a great dip or sauce for tacos, burritos, and more! French Onion Dip Tomato Burrata Learn to make a burrata and tomato salad using fresh burrata, heirloom tomatoes, basil, balsamic glaze, olive oil and pesto. This recipe is so fresh and delicious! Pizza Bagels Learn to make Pizza Bagels as a quick and easy dinner idea. Use bagels, pizza sauce, cheese and toppings to create this easy meal.  Buffalo Chicken Dip A creamy baked dip with just five ingredients. Pico De Gallo A popular Mexican dish of raw chopped tomatoes, onion, cilantro, and lime. Bruschetta Learn to make authentic Italian Bruschetta using ripe tomatoes, basil, parmesan cheese, garlic, olive oil and balsamic vinegar. Cowboy Caviar Learn to make Cowboy Caviar using tomatoes, peppers, beans, corn, cilantro, onions and avocado. Serve with tortilla chips!  Protein Balls 7 Layer Salad Learn to make the iconic Seven Layer Salad! The Best Homemade Chex Mix Recipe (in the Oven or Microwave) This easy homemade Chex Mix is a delicious combo of crunchy and salty flavors. Cocktail Sauce This shrimp cocktail dipping sauce made from just five ingredients: ketchup, horseradish, Worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, and Tabasco. Homemade Salsa The best homemade salsa recipe with fresh and zesty ingredients that will give you Mexican restaurant-style salsa to enjoy in just minutes! You’ll need tomatoes, canned tomatoes, garlic, onion, lime juice, jalapeno, and sugar. Air Fryer Meatballs Simple, juicy meatballs you can cook in the air fryer. 7-Layer Dip This 7-layer dip recipe includes refried beans, spiced sour cream and cream cheese, guacamole, salsa, cheddar cheese, olives, and tomatoes as the layers. Bonus points if you throw some cilantro or green onions on top for some additional color. Macaroni Salad A classic, creamy macaroni pasta salad recipe. Mango Salsa Air Fryer Okra You’ll be so impressed with this air fried okra! You need okra, egg, flour, and bread crumbs. Baked Seafood Dip If you love seafood, you will love this dip. Made with cream cheese, mayo, anchovy paste, garlic, tiny shrimp, parmesan cheese, and Old Bay seasoning. Corn Dip This is a cold, creamy dip made with just five ingredients: canned corn, mayo, sour cream, green onions, and pepper jack cheese. It’s perfect for a picnic, boat day, or really any party spread. Baked Potato Chip Crab Cakes This appetizer gets bonus points because it’s not only delicious, but it’s sort of adorable too. I never thought I’d say that about a crab cake, but there you go. Made with imitation crab meat, jalapeno, celery, Dijon mustard, seafood seasoning, and potato chips. Smoked Salmon Dip A creamy and savory dip made of smoked salmon, cream cheese, sour cream, lemon juice, dill, capers, and everything bagel seasoning. This appetizer is super easy to make! Serve it with pita chips, crackers, or vegetables. Crunchy, Cheesy Asparagus Sticks This delicious appetizer is made with cheese sticks, asparagus, eggs, bread crumbs, and flour. Pumpkin Pasties Learn to make Pumpkin Pasties inspired by Harry Potter using pie crust, pumpkin puree, honey, vanilla, spices and egg wash. Cream Cheese Fruit Dip It only takes five minutes to make an easy vanilla, strawberry, chocolate, or caramel cream cheese fruit dip—perfect for any party! Homemade Pretzel Pizza Bites This recipe for pretzel pizza bites is as good as it sounds. Soft chewy pretzels combined with gooey melted cheese get dusted in fresh herbs and then dunked in hot marinara sauce. Stuffed Mushrooms You know it’s a good party when the appetizers are amazing. Which is exactly why I recommend you make these stuffed mushrooms next time you are hosting! Made with portobello mushrooms, butter, shallot, garlic, bread crumbs, and cream cheese. Air Fryer Sweet Potato Fries How to make crispy, delicious sweet potato fries in the air fryer. Pepper Jack Bites These are very much like the appetizer version of pizza. And I’m going to give you two options: you can bake or fry. It’s up to you. You need pepper jack cheese, flour, eggs, bread crumbs, and dried oregano flakes. Air Fryer Asparagus How to make perfectly tender asparagus in the air fryer. Spinach and Artichoke Fondue This fondue is not only TOO delicious, it’s also really fun to eat because you get to use poky sticks. Made with Gruyere cheese, flour, cream cheese, garlic, white wine, and spinach. Toasted Coconut Onion Rings These are a jazzed up version of onion rings. They are heavy on the onion, low on the breading, with toasted coconut coating the outsides.  The Best Fruit Salad A recipe for classic fruit salad. The citrus honey dressing makes the flavors bright and delicious. Spicy Avocado Hummus  This delicious hummus is made with avocado, chickpeas, tahini, red pepper, and jalapeno. Goat Cheese Logs I love goat cheese, but it’s not the prettiest cheese for a cheese board. So this past weekend I tried covering three logs of goat cheese with random toppings and they came out REALLY cute! I added roasted nuts, toasted seed, chocolate chips, and coconut chips. Jalapeño Popper Dip This dip is creamy, salty with just the right amount of spicy. Made with cream cheese, mayo, pepper jack cheese, jalapenos, green chilies, and parmesan cheese. Air Fryer Pickles These air fried pickles are crispy and lightly breaded. All you need is dill pickles, flour, all-purpose spice, and oil. Spicy Pimento Cauliflower Bites These Spicy Pimento Cauliflower Bites are crunchy, spicy and go oh-so-well with the creamy pimento cheese dip I made alongside them. You need cauliflower, flour, milk, dice pimento, cream cheese, cheddar, and mayo. Easy Creamy Chicken Dip This dip is SO good and really easy to make with white meat chicken, Underwood chicken spread, cream cheese, soy sauce, and mayo. Roasted Grape + Honey Goat Cheese Crostini Honey goat cheese pairs so well with the sweet taste of roasted grapes and rosemary. And it all comes together in a nice crunch with a toasted crostini underneath. Your guests will love this recipe. English Muffin Pizza Learn to make English Muffin Pizzas using English muffins, butter, sauce, cheese and toppings. An easy, kid-friendly recipe!  Rotel Dip This is a quick and easy cheese dip recipe made from Velveeta cheese, Rotel tomatoes, chili powder, cayenne, and cilantro. Pigs in a Blanket Pigs in a blanket is probably the most adorable appetizer name of all time, right? The idea is simple; hot dogs (or other pork sausage) rolled in bread and baked. Tzatziki Deviled Eggs Deviled eggs have got to be one of the most addictive appetizers of all time. If you’ve never had them before, they are simply hard boiled eggs cut in half and the yolks are mixed with mayo, Dijon, and vinegar; then piped or spooned back into the egg half. Chocolate Hummus A dessert version of the classic. Stuffed Peppers Cheesy, beef and Spanish rice filled peppers. Crispy Air Fryer Brussels Sprouts A crispy Brussels sprout recipe that can be made in an air fryer.
html:
Looking for some great appetizers for your next gathering? In this post, we’re sharing our top appetizer recipes including deviled eggs, crab cakes, sausage balls, bruschetta and caprese skewers. We have dips, salads, toasts and more!

Crab Cakes

Learn to make Maryland Crab Cakes using real lump crab and very little filler. These crab cakes are easy to make at home. 

Sausage Balls

Cheesy, crispy sausage balls made with just four ingredients.

Caprese Skewers

Learn to make Caprese Skewers in just minutes using cherry tomatoes, mozzarella balls, fresh basil leaves and balsamic glaze.

Pinwheel Sandwiches

Finger food perfect for any party or school lunch.

Best Baked Macaroni and Cheese

Classic baked macaroni and cheese with no eggs or evaporated milk.

Avocado Salsa

This easy avocado salsa is a cross between guacamole and a salsa verde and makes a great dip or sauce for tacos, burritos, and more!

French Onion Dip

Tomato Burrata

Learn to make a burrata and tomato salad using fresh burrata, heirloom tomatoes, basil, balsamic glaze, olive oil and pesto. This recipe is so fresh and delicious!

Pizza Bagels

Learn to make Pizza Bagels as a quick and easy dinner idea. Use bagels, pizza sauce, cheese and toppings to create this easy meal. 

Buffalo Chicken Dip

A creamy baked dip with just five ingredients.

Pico De Gallo

A popular Mexican dish of raw chopped tomatoes, onion, cilantro, and lime.

Bruschetta

Learn to make authentic Italian Bruschetta using ripe tomatoes, basil, parmesan cheese, garlic, olive oil and balsamic vinegar.

Cowboy Caviar

Learn to make Cowboy Caviar using tomatoes, peppers, beans, corn, cilantro, onions and avocado. Serve with tortilla chips! 

Protein Balls

7 Layer Salad

Learn to make the iconic Seven Layer Salad!

The Best Homemade Chex Mix Recipe (in the Oven or Microwave)

This easy homemade Chex Mix is a delicious combo of crunchy and salty flavors.

Cocktail Sauce

This shrimp cocktail dipping sauce made from just five ingredients: ketchup, horseradish, Worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, and Tabasco.

Homemade Salsa

The best homemade salsa recipe with fresh and zesty ingredients that will give you Mexican restaurant-style salsa to enjoy in just minutes! You’ll need tomatoes, canned tomatoes, garlic, onion, lime juice, jalapeno, and sugar.

Air Fryer Meatballs

Simple, juicy meatballs you can cook in the air fryer.

7-Layer Dip

This 7-layer dip recipe includes refried beans, spiced sour cream and cream cheese, guacamole, salsa, cheddar cheese, olives, and tomatoes as the layers. Bonus points if you throw some cilantro or green onions on top for some additional color.

Macaroni Salad

A classic, creamy macaroni pasta salad recipe.

Mango Salsa

Air Fryer Okra

You’ll be so impressed with this air fried okra! You need okra, egg, flour, and bread crumbs.

Baked Seafood Dip

If you love seafood, you will love this dip. Made with cream cheese, mayo, anchovy paste, garlic, tiny shrimp, parmesan cheese, and Old Bay seasoning.

Corn Dip

This is a cold, creamy dip made with just five ingredients: canned corn, mayo, sour cream, green onions, and pepper jack cheese. It’s perfect for a picnic, boat day, or really any party spread.

Baked Potato Chip Crab Cakes

This appetizer gets bonus points because it’s not only delicious, but it’s sort of adorable too. I never thought I’d say that about a crab cake, but there you go. Made with imitation crab meat, jalapeno, celery, Dijon mustard, seafood seasoning, and potato chips.

Smoked Salmon Dip

A creamy and savory dip made of smoked salmon, cream cheese, sour cream, lemon juice, dill, capers, and everything bagel seasoning. This appetizer is super easy to make! Serve it with pita chips, crackers, or vegetables.

Crunchy, Cheesy Asparagus Sticks

This delicious appetizer is made with cheese sticks, asparagus, eggs, bread crumbs, and flour.

Pumpkin Pasties

Learn to make Pumpkin Pasties inspired by Harry Potter using pie crust, pumpkin puree, honey, vanilla, spices and egg wash.

Cream Cheese Fruit Dip

It only takes five minutes to make an easy vanilla, strawberry, chocolate, or caramel cream cheese fruit dip—perfect for any party!

Homemade Pretzel Pizza Bites

This recipe for pretzel pizza bites is as good as it sounds. Soft chewy pretzels combined with gooey melted cheese get dusted in fresh herbs and then dunked in hot marinara sauce.

Stuffed Mushrooms

You know it’s a good party when the appetizers are amazing. Which is exactly why I recommend you make these stuffed mushrooms next time you are hosting! Made with portobello mushrooms, butter, shallot, garlic, bread crumbs, and cream cheese.

Air Fryer Sweet Potato Fries

How to make crispy, delicious sweet potato fries in the air fryer.

Pepper Jack Bites

These are very much like the appetizer version of pizza. And I’m going to give you two options: you can bake or fry. It’s up to you. You need pepper jack cheese, flour, eggs, bread crumbs, and dried oregano flakes.

Air Fryer Asparagus

How to make perfectly tender asparagus in the air fryer.

Spinach and Artichoke Fondue

This fondue is not only TOO delicious, it’s also really fun to eat because you get to use poky sticks. Made with Gruyere cheese, flour, cream cheese, garlic, white wine, and spinach.

Toasted Coconut Onion Rings

These are a jazzed up version of onion rings. They are heavy on the onion, low on the breading, with toasted coconut coating the outsides. 

The Best Fruit Salad

A recipe for classic fruit salad. The citrus honey dressing makes the flavors bright and delicious.

Spicy Avocado Hummus 

This delicious hummus is made with avocado, chickpeas, tahini, red pepper, and jalapeno.

Goat Cheese Logs

I love goat cheese, but it’s not the prettiest cheese for a cheese board. So this past weekend I tried covering three logs of goat cheese with random toppings and they came out REALLY cute! I added roasted nuts, toasted seed, chocolate chips, and coconut chips.

Jalapeño Popper Dip

This dip is creamy, salty with just the right amount of spicy. Made with cream cheese, mayo, pepper jack cheese, jalapenos, green chilies, and parmesan cheese.

Air Fryer Pickles

These air fried pickles are crispy and lightly breaded. All you need is dill pickles, flour, all-purpose spice, and oil.

Spicy Pimento Cauliflower Bites

These Spicy Pimento Cauliflower Bites are crunchy, spicy and go oh-so-well with the creamy pimento cheese dip I made alongside them. You need cauliflower, flour, milk, dice pimento, cream cheese, cheddar, and mayo.

Easy Creamy Chicken Dip

This dip is SO good and really easy to make with white meat chicken, Underwood chicken spread, cream cheese, soy sauce, and mayo.

Roasted Grape + Honey Goat Cheese Crostini

Honey goat cheese pairs so well with the sweet taste of roasted grapes and rosemary. And it all comes together in a nice crunch with a toasted crostini underneath. Your guests will love this recipe.

English Muffin Pizza

Learn to make English Muffin Pizzas using English muffins, butter, sauce, cheese and toppings. An easy, kid-friendly recipe! 

Rotel Dip

This is a quick and easy cheese dip recipe made from Velveeta cheese, Rotel tomatoes, chili powder, cayenne, and cilantro.

Pigs in a Blanket

Pigs in a blanket is probably the most adorable appetizer name of all time, right? The idea is simple; hot dogs (or other pork sausage) rolled in bread and baked.

Tzatziki

Deviled Eggs

Deviled eggs have got to be one of the most addictive appetizers of all time. If you’ve never had them before, they are simply hard boiled eggs cut in half and the yolks are mixed with mayo, Dijon, and vinegar; then piped or spooned back into the egg half.

Chocolate Hummus

A dessert version of the classic.

Stuffed Peppers

Cheesy, beef and Spanish rice filled peppers.

Crispy Air Fryer Brussels Sprouts

A crispy Brussels sprout recipe that can be made in an air fryer.
